title: My pixel 3 just stopped working?
content:
I left my phone on a table for a couple of minutes, and when i looked at it, it was, repetitively, doing the squeeze feature. I tried to stopped but couldn't.

I turned off and left it for sometime. and now when i turn it on, it shut off automatically as soon as it finish booting up.

I need a fix as soon as possible. I'm on a vacation in Saudi Arabia, I cant leave the phone.

Please help me!!!
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
